amendment.description: To ensure that the deficit-neutral reserve fund for infrastructure includes investment in rural broadband deployment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 803 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Franken. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2020) To ensure that the deficit-neutral reserve fund for infrastructure includes investment in rural broadband deployment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 803 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 803 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Franken.
